Package com.radirius.mercury.graphics

Interface Summary
Batcher An abstraction for batchers.
Graphics An abstraction for all graphics.
 

Class Summary
Animation An easy to use animation class.
Camera An object for the camera.
Color A class for a color that will hold R, G, B, and A values.
FrameBuffer An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for post-processing effects.
Shader An object version of shaders.
SpriteSheet A class for spritesheets.
SubTexture A class for sub-textures.
Texture An object version of a texture.
VAOBatcher A very simple OpenGL batcher.
VAOBatcher.VertexData  
VAOGraphics An object used for graphics.
VAOUtils A utilities class for vertex array objects.
